item.title: 华伦天奴主席押注米歇尔加盟后奢华不再
item.description: 华伦天奴（Valentino）董事长预言，时尚界所谓的静谧奢华时代已经过去，富裕的消费者将再次需要大胆的设计。【原文：The fashion industry’s era of so-called quiet luxury is over and affluent consumers will want bold designs again, the chairman of Valentino has predicted.】

item.title: 投资银行业务不景气，Alantra 德国裁员一半
item.description: Alantra Partners SA 已将其德国分部的员工人数裁减了约一半，因为这家西班牙公司在交易荒之后对其投资银行业务进行了重组。【原文：Alantra Partners SA has cut staff numbers by about half at its German unit as the Spanish firm reorganizes its investment banking business following a drought in dealmaking.】

item.title: 尼日尔将用石油预付款偿还 6 亿美元地区市场债务
item.description: 中国与尼日尔达成的 4 亿美元石油预付款协议将帮助这个西非国家的军政府偿还自去年军事政变以来积累的债务。【原文：China’s $400 million deal with Niger to pay for oil in advance will help the West African nation’s junta pay debt it’s accumulated since a military coup last year.】

item.title: SMBC 称热衷于为 SAF 项目提供融资的银行面临主要风险
item.description: 三井住友银行（Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp）表示，银行热衷于为可持续航空燃料项目提供融资，但面临的主要风险包括原料供应的不确定性和围绕燃料的政策规定的不断变化。【原文：Banks are keen to finance sustainable aviation fuel projects, but face key risks including uncertainty over feedstock supplies and changing policy mandates around the fuel, according to Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp.】

item.title: 量化对冲基金 Aspect Mints 以 21% 的回报率玩转货币市场
item.description: Aspect Capital Ltd.的计算机驱动交易模型正从不确定性中茁壮成长，而这种不确定性让许多人类投资者放弃了他们的大型宏观看涨交易。【原文：Aspect Capital Ltd.’s computer-driven trading models are thriving from the uncertainty that has many human investors ripping up their big macro calls.】

item.title: 莫迪对穆斯林的评论引发对选举机构的投诉
item.description: 在印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）过去两天在集会上发表了他们认为具有宗教分裂性的言论后，印度的主要反对党向该国的选举机构提出了申诉。【原文：India’s main opposition party complained to the country’s election body after Prime Minister Narendra Modi made comments at rallies over the past two days which they say were religiously divisive.】

item.title: 卡地纳健康在 Optum Rx 配送合同终止后业绩下滑
item.description: Cardinal Health Inc. 的股价在早盘交易中大幅下跌，原因是该药品分销商失去了与 UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：Cardinal Health Inc. shares fell sharply in early trading after the drug distributor lost a contract with UnitedHealth Group Inc.’s pharmacy benefits subsidiary.】

item.title: 银行家飞来评估 MBS 的沙漠梦想
item.description: 在接下来的几天里，私人飞机将把金融家们送往王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼（Mohammed bin Salman）1.5 万亿美元沙漠梦想的所在地--未来城市尼欧姆（Neom）。该项目于七年前公布，是沙特对依赖石油的经济进行大规模调整的核心项目。【原文：Over the next few days, private jets will ferry financiers to the site of Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s $1.5 trillion desert dream — the futuristic city of Neom. The event is part of Saudi Arabia’s efforts to drum up interest in the project, unveiled seven years ago as the centerpiece of a massive rejig of the oil-dependent economy.】

item.title: 债务和污水如何将泰晤士河水务公司推向边缘
item.description: 通常枯燥乏味的水务行业不应该成为新闻头条。但污水泄漏和水管漏水的丑闻却让英国对这一公共资源的管理蒙上了一层阴影，也让人们对三十年前水务私有化时建立的商业模式产生了更深层次的疑问。由于股东拒绝为泰晤士河水务有限公司（Thames Water Ltd. ）提供所需的现金，该公司可能面临暂时国有化的危险。【原文：The usually dull water business isn’t supposed to make news headlines. But scandals over sewage spills and leaky pipes are casting a harsh light on Britain’s management of this public resource and raising deeper questions about the business model established when it was privatized three decades ago. Things have got so bad that Thames Water Ltd., which serves about a quarter of the UK population, faces possible temporary nationalization after shareholders refused to stump up the cash it needs for】

item.title: 前阿德尔菲合伙人将在埃德加-艾伦的公司管理新对冲基金
item.description: 埃德加-艾伦（Edgar Allen）的高地投资管理公司（High Ground Investment Management）正准备启动第二支对冲基金，该基金将由前阿德尔菲资本（Adelphi Capital）合伙人亨利-盖斯（Henry Guest）负责管理。【原文：Edgar Allen’s High Ground Investment Management is preparing to start its second hedge fund, which will be run by former Adelphi Capital partner Henry Guest.】

item.title: 花旗银行认为利率仍居高不下，交易受阻
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）发现，尽管利率上升阻碍了更广泛的交易环境，但许多客户在寻求增长的过程中开始考虑小型收购。【原文：Citigroup Inc. is seeing a number of clients begin to consider smaller acquisitions in their hunt for growth even as higher interest rates stymie the broader dealmaking environment.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司将以 5.3 亿美元收购萨普拉能源公司的天然气资产
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）同意以 5.3 亿美元的价格收购萨普拉能源有限公司（Sapura Energy Bhd.【原文：TotalEnergies SE agreed to buy Sapura Energy Bhd.’s 50% stake in Malaysian natural gas producer SapuraOMV Upstream Sdn for $530 million, reaffirming its recent bet in the southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: VDP称今年德国写字楼价值将下降10%之多
item.description: 德国银行业协会 VDP 预测，今年所有房地产资产类别的价格都将下跌，其中写字楼受经济增长放缓和居家办公趋势的影响尤为严重。【原文：German banking association VDP forecasts more price drops across all real estate asset classes this year with offices hit especially hard by slower growth and sticky work-from-home trends.】

item.title: 简街 10 亿美元交易聚焦印度期权
item.description: 印度的一项期权策略据称为简街集团赚取了 10 亿美元，这场法庭闹剧正在引起人们对世界上增长最快的衍生品市场之一的新关注。【原文：The courtroom drama over an Indian options strategy that allegedly made $1 billion for Jane Street Group is drawing fresh attention to one of the world’s fastest-growing derivatives markets.】

item.title: Alphabet 的 "现金潮 "让华尔街对分红充满希望
item.description: Alphabet 公司带来了大量现金，人们希望它能借鉴 Meta Platforms 公司的做法，开始支付股息。【原文：Alphabet Inc. is bringing in so much cash that hopes are rising it will take a page out of the Meta Platforms Inc. playbook and start paying a dividend.】

item.title: 据说 MUFG 将考虑更优惠的建屋发展基金要约，因为它希望在战略上有所作为
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，三菱日联金融集团正在考虑提高其17亿美元收购HDFC银行有限公司印度消费贷款部门少数股权的报价，交易可能取决于估值和日本银行对战略的发言权。【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. is considering sweetening its $1.7 billion offer for a minority stake in HDFC Bank Ltd.’s consumer lending unit in India, with a deal potentially hinging on valuation and the Japanese bank having a say in strategy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 邮轮运营商维京为 11 亿美元首次公开募股设定价格范围
item.description: 维京控股有限公司（Viking Holdings Ltd.）及其现有股东正寻求在纽约首次公开募股中筹集多达 11 亿美元的资金，这家邮轮运营商希望在旅游业从大流行病时期的低迷中反弹之际上市。【原文：Viking Holdings Ltd. and its existing shareholders are seeking to raise as much as $1.1 billion in a New York initial public offering, with the cruise operator looking to go public as the travel industry rebounds from its pandemic-era slump.】

item.title: Chipotle 墨西哥烤肉店将在中东开设首家分店
item.description: Chipotle Mexican Grill 公司将于本周二在科威特市开设其在中东的第一家分店，而自以色列-哈马斯战争爆发以来，一些美国公司在该地区的销售额有所下降。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc. will open its first Middle East location, in Kuwait City on Tuesday, amid lower sales in the region among some US-based companies since the beginning of the Israel-Hamas war.】

item.title: 外国首席执行官正在改变法国公司的企业格局
item.description: 一段时间以来，法国公司正在进行一场静悄悄的革命：外国出生的首席执行官正在管理着法国一些最具战略意义的公司，这在几十年前是不可想象的。【原文：For a little while now, a quiet revolution has been under way in France Inc.: Foreign-born CEOs are running some of the country’s most-strategic companies, something that would have been unthinkable just a few decades ago.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金在波动的一周转为股票买家
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Hedge funds are getting back to buying global equities, shrugging off broader market volatility to gobble up tech stocks at the fastest pace in two months, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s trading desk.】

item.title: 白糖从近一年低点回升，因有迹象表明供应趋紧
item.description: 白糖期货在纽约上涨，原因是有迹象表明供应趋紧，提振了上周跌至一年多来最低点的价格。【原文：Sugar futures rose in New York as signs of tighter supplies buoyed prices that last week slumped to the lowest in more than a year.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司正在洽谈收购恒力石化 10%的股份
item.description: 阿美石油公司周一发表声明称，该公司正在洽谈收购中国石化公司恒力石化 10%的股份。【原文：Aramco is in talks to acquire a 10% stake in Chinese petrochemical company Hengli Petrochemical, according to a statement Monday.】

item.title: 华尔街银行掠夺者辞去税务丑闻最高检察官职务
item.description: 德国检察官曾领导对华尔街最大的几家银行进行税务突击检查，她将辞去调查 100 亿欧元（107 亿美元）Cum-Ex 税务丑闻的职务，理由是打击金融犯罪缺乏政治支持。【原文：The German prosecutor who led tax raids on some of Wall Street’s biggest banks is quitting her role probing the €10 billion ($10.7 billion) Cum-Ex tax scandal — citing a lack of political backing for the fight against financial crimes.】

item.title: 雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）的著名交易正陷入困境，投资者纷纷撤离
item.description: 这是一个无法抗拒的诱惑。雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）的桥水联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）和其他对冲基金的高管们说，把你们的钱交给我们，我们会把钱注入一个长期赚钱的稳赚策略。但现在，在经历了五年的不理想回报后，许多将大笔资金投入风险对冲基金的机构投资者要求将资金收回。【原文：It was an irresistible pitch. Give us your money, executives at Ray Dalio’s Bridgewater Associates and other hedge funds said, and we’ll funnel it into a money-minting, sure-thing strategy for the long haul. But now, after five years of sub-par returns, many of the institutional investors who sunk large sums into risk-parity funds, as they’re known, are demanding it back.】

item.title: EQT 聘请 Peter Aliprantis 领导美洲私人财富部门
item.description: EQT AB 已任命 Peter Aliprantis 为其美洲私人财富管理业务主管，进一步推动整个行业为高净值客户提供私人市场投资机会。【原文：EQT AB has appointed Peter Aliprantis as head of its Americas private wealth management business, furthering a push across the industry to offer high-net-worth clients access to private market investments.】

item.title: 丹麦启动史上最大规模海上风电招标
item.description: 丹麦启动了有史以来最大规模的风力发电招标，到本十年末，其海上发电能力将增加两倍多。【原文：Denmark has kicked off its largest-ever wind power tender that will more than triple its offshore capacity by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 特斯拉、Meta 等公司业绩将考验股市近期跌势
item.description: 在最近的市场低迷中，投资者似乎更青睐价值型股票而非成长型股票，上周美国股市出现了自硅谷银行倒闭以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Investors appear to be favoring value stocks over growth in the latest market downturn, which saw the biggest drop for US equities last week since the Silicon Valley Bank collapse.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在科技股大跌导致英伟达（Nvidia）市值缩水 2,120 亿美元之后，美国股市将迎来复苏。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. US stocks are set to recover after a tech-led selloff which slashed Nvidia’s market value by $212 billion. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】
